H0.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1920s

H2.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1890s

H3.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1910s

A4.text: In February 1912, Dawson contacted Arthur Smith Woodward, Keeper of Geology at the Natural History Museum, stating he had found a section of a humanâ€‘like skull in Pleistocene gravel beds near Piltdown, East Sussex.

A5.text: 1908: Dawson claims discovery of first Piltdown fragments.

A6.text: Bone fragments said to have been collected in 1912 were presented as the fossilised remains of a previously unknown early human, referred to as Piltdown Man.
